com.example.wordfindertwo.core.board
Interface BoardDrawingInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Board
public interface BoardDrawingInterface

Interface with all the methods needed to draw the board. Contains methods for retrieving information about the different ILetterFields.

Method Summary

          Returns the character of the field at the given coordinates

          Returns the Letter at the given coordinates.

          Returns the numerical value of the field at the given coordinates
 

Method Detail

getLetterAt

Letter getLetterAt(int x,
                   int y)
Returns the Letter at the given coordinates.

Parameters:
x - x-coordinate of the letter. 0 is left, 5 is right
y - y-coordinate of the letter. 0 is top, 5 is bottom
Returns:
